messages.message:
Brian
I can't tell if your reality includes God, I really don't see the difference.
My reality includes God. Just not in the same way God is part of your reality.

Brian
YES!
God is part of my reality because I live in a world with theists. I know to them he is real even tho to me he's not

Brian
That is exactly what I have been thinking.
But a unicorn is part of my reality because everyone knows what a unicorn is. That doesn't mean unicorns are real.

Brian
I think the singularity already happened.  I am a Christian.
Which singularity?

Brian
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Technological_singularity
Technological singularity - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
The technological singularity (also, simply, the singularity)[1][2] is the hypothesis that the invention of artificial superintelligence will abruptly trigger runaway technological growth, resulting in unfathomable changes to human civilization.[3] According to this hypothesis, an upgradable intelli...
en.wikipedia.org

We are approaching a singularity when machines blend with humans
Oh. We were thinking the same thing

Brian
It already happened.  I can identify coincidences as opportunities.  Just by being, success comes to me.  I could measure opportunity using productivity, but it would take an entire lifetime to prove the existence.
But yea. I don't think that singularity has happened yet. We are close tho

Brian
I have started using Google calendar as a todo list.
No it hasn't happened yet

Brian
We are the singularity.  I'm being managed.
Man still controls machines. We depend on machines but we still control them

Brian
See I already had me responce.

Brian
Thank you!  You are my council.  I trust you to moderate my voice.
Will it work?
Can a troll be positive?
No

Brian
I am positive.  I haven't said anything mean.

If ur actually looking for answers to questions then make sure you word things correctly and don't be condescending
Don't be a troll

Brian
I have started writing down every "coincidence" that I notice, at the end of my life I will be able to prove how my reaction led to my success.  I can only prove it at the end with productivity, but practicing it helps me realize the opportunities now!

Present urself as someone with only questions
If ur actually looking for answers to questions then make sure you word things correctly and don't be condescending

Brian
My questions are too hard.

See ur being arrogant
Ur questions are not too hard
Ur questions are simple that all of us as atheist have already asked ourselves
And all still atheist
But if you have honest questions but ask atheists in a trolling way then the atheists are gonna troll you back

Brian
Right, but I didn't know that, you just told me.
Arrogant or ignorant?

Arrogant
There is nothing wrong with being ignorant
Once u ask the question and get an answer then you are no longer ignorant

Brian
Can you be a god?
No.

Brian
Why?
Arrogant or ignorant?
All I need is an answer and I will know as much as you.
Such a weird coincidence, I've never noticed the "Translate now" feature on FB for words that are in English.  Something is managing me.
My latest post is getting more attention from atheist females.  Interesting metric.
Which one? What was the post? Tag me. I'm not God. I can't be everywhere. Lol

Brian
With the internet you can be everywhere.  I just chose you because I know we have something in common.
What do we have in common?

Brian
Our disbelief.
Disbelief in what? I have disbelief in many things

Brian
For one, God.  I can't believe he did this to me.  Damnit.
I have been blind-sided.  I have been asleep for 30 years.  Now trauma gives me the perfect opportunity to share what I learned.

What do u think "god" did to you?
What have u learned?

Brian
God made me imperfect, so that I have to struggle every fucking day to try and be a better person.  I've learned that there is not such thing as coincidence, only opportunities to better myself.  Every Atheist I've met already knows that aspect of God, but they haven't realized it yet.  Church is like politics, its another system of control.  Only God can come from within.

Brian
Everything you say to me helps me market my voice to a different audience.  I am learning marketing in 5 minutes instead of 5 years of education.
What are you thinking?

Hey stop ur shit
People are complaining you won't leave them alone and keep requesting to be friends
That is called trolling

Brian
How many people?
Irrelevant

Brian
Not to me.
To me it is

Brian
What can I do?
Stop ur shit or u can find urself in another group

Brian
can I be an admin?
I promise not to abuse it.

Ok. Done. Ur an admin.
Have fun. Be respectful

Brian
Awesome.
Thank you
How many posts per week?
1?
What?

Brian
I wont friend anymore strangers and only 1 weird question per week and I run it by you first?  Good rule of thumb?
If u say so

Brian
Thank you sir.  You are a magnate.

Brian
Can I post a link to Midnight Special the movie? Every one has to see that to understand where my mind is right now. It is child safe.

Go ahead
Don't flood too the room with stuff. Keep it limited to a post or two

Brian
Ok I'll wait until tomorrow. Good idea. I've gotten too much attention already.
U there?

Brian
Yeah.  What's up?

All the admins in the group are in a separate thread. Since ur an admin I'm gonna add u to that place.
Introduce urself and u can ask questions to people behind the curtain
Introduce urself and u can ask questions to people behind the curtain

Brian
That helps.  Thank you.
Ok added. Introduce urself

Brian
Where?

It should have popped up in your messenger
It's called "admins"

Brian
Weird, I don't think messenger is working that way.
I've noticed other  coincidences on the internet, really weird stuff.

U see the one called admins?
Click on that

Brian
that worked.
This guy is ready too

I think I am the piece atheists are missing, you are all too smart for me to give up now.  I care about intelligence.

Brian
What are you thinking?

Brian
Tell me if I am being too loud, lol

Brian
How many people complained?  I need metrics.
Brian

Brian
Everything going well?
